item.Q:
Write the character:
1: (possessive, modifying, or descriptive particle); of
2: aim; clear
3: really and truly
item.A:
1: de 2: dì 3: dí
有的 yǒude (there are) some (who are...); some (exist) 目的 mùdì purpose; aim; goal; target; objective 的确 (的確) díquè really; indeed

item.Q:
Write the character:
(negative prefix); not; no
item.A:
bù
不能 bùnéng cannot; must not; should not

item.Q:
Write the character:
one; 1; single; a (article); as soon as; entire; whole; all; throughout
item.A:
yī
一定 yīdìng surely; certainly; necessarily; fixed; a certain (extent etc); given; particular

item.Q:
Write the character:
to have; there is; there are; to exist; to be
item.A:
yǒu
没有 (沒有) méiyǒu haven't; hasn't; doesn't exist; to not have; to not be

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: can; be possible; be able to; to assemble; to meet; to gather; to see; union; group; association
2: to balance an account; accounting
item.A:
traditional: 會
1: huì 2: kuài
社会 (社會) shèhuì society 会计 (會計) kuàijì accountant; accounting

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: good; well
2: to be fond of
item.A:
1: hǎo 2: hào
好的 hǎode (adj) OK 爱好 (愛好) àihào to like; to be fond of; to be keen on; interest; hobby

item.Q:
Write the character:
on; on top; upon; first (of two parts); previous or last (week etc); upper; higher; above; previous; to climb; to go into; above; to go up; to attend (class or university); third tone of putonghua
item.A:
shàng
以上 yǐshàng more than; above; over; the above-mentioned

traditional: 來
lái
出来 (出來) chūlái to come out; to emerge

yòng
作用 zuòyòng action; activity; actions; acts; effect; to play a role

rú
如果 rúguǒ if; in case; in the event that

2: aim; clear
3: really and truly

item.Q:
Write the character: de
(yǒude de de)
item.A:
(possessive, modifying, or descriptive particle); of
有的 yǒude (there are) some (who are...); some (exist)

item.Q:
Write the character: dì
(mùdì de dì)
item.A:
aim; clear
目的 mùdì purpose; aim; goal; target; objective

item.Q:
Write the character: dí
(díquè de dí)
item.A:
really and truly
的确 (的確) díquè really; indeed

item.Q:
Write the character: bù
(bùnéng de bù)
item.A:
(negative prefix); not; no
不能 bùnéng cannot; must not; should not

item.Q:
Write the character: yī
(yīdìng de yī)
item.A:
one; 1; single; a (article); as soon as; entire; whole; all; throughout
一定 yīdìng surely; certainly; necessarily; fixed; a certain (extent etc); given; particular

item.Q:
Write the character: yǒu
(méiyǒu de yǒu)
item.A:
to have; there is; there are; to exist; to be
没有 (沒有) méiyǒu haven't; hasn't; doesn't exist; to not have; to not be

item.Q:
Write the character: huì
(shèhuì de huì)
item.A:
traditional: 會
can; be possible; be able to; to assemble; to meet; to gather; to see; union; group; association
社会 (社會) shèhuì society

item.Q:
Write the character: kuài
(kuàijì de kuài)
item.A:
traditional: 會
to balance an account; accounting
会计 (會計) kuàijì accountant; accounting

item.Q:
Write the character: hǎo
(hǎode de hǎo)
item.A:
good; well
好的 hǎode (adj) OK

item.Q:
Write the character: hào
(àihào de hào)
item.A:
to be fond of
爱好 (愛好) àihào to like; to be fond of; to be keen on; interest; hobby

item.Q:
Write the character: shàng
(yǐshàng de shàng)
item.A:
on; on top; upon; first (of two parts); previous or last (week etc); upper; higher; above; previous; to climb; to go into; above; to go up; to attend (class or university); third tone of putonghua
以上 yǐshàng more than; above; over; the above-mentioned

item.Q:
Write the character: lái
(chūlái de lái)
item.A:
traditional: 來
to come
出来 (出來) chūlái to come out; to emerge

item.Q:
Write the character: yòng
(zuòyòng de yòng)
item.A:
to use
作用 zuòyòng action; activity; actions; acts; effect; to play a role

item.Q:
Write the character: rú
(rúguǒ de rú)
item.A:
as (if); such as
如果 rúguǒ if; in case; in the event that

traditional: 演講
yǎnjiǎng lecture; to make a speech
bózi neck

traditional: 姿勢
zīshì posture; position

traditional: 正確
zhèngquè correct; proper

traditional: 筆記本
bǐjìběn notebook

traditional: 課本
kèběn textbook

traditional: 有害無益
yǒuhàiwúyì (set phrase) not helpful but harmful; to do harm rather than good
gǎishàn to make better; to improve

traditional: 對稱
duìchèn symmetry; symmetrical

traditional: 隨時隨地
suíshísuídì at any time or place
pìgu buttocks; bottom; arse; end; butt
kǒudài a bag; a pocket

traditional: 壓迫
yāpò oppress; oppression

traditional: 神經
shénjīng nerve
hǎobùróngyì very difficult; after all the trouble

traditional: 釣魚
diàoyú to fish (with line and hook)
yīdìng surely; certainly; necessarily; fixed; a certain (extent etc); given; particular

traditional: 新鮮
xīnxiān fresh (experience, food etc); freshness
yònglì exert oneself (physically); put forth one's strength

traditional: 魚餌
yúěr fish bait

traditional: 一會兒
yìhuǐr a while
yīhuìer a while

traditional: 釣竿
diàogān fishing rod

traditional: 一無所獲
yīwúsuǒhuò to have accomplished nothing
